means: （使）腐烂，（使）腐败( putrefy的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The meat in all of the open flasks putrefied.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有开口瓶中的肉都腐烂了。

sentence.Network_en: Putrefied and moonlight casts a basso - relievo.
sentence.Network_cn: 袅娜地升起,月光投下一块浮雕.

sentence.Network_en: Undigested meat remaining in the intestines become putrefied and leads to more toxic buildup.
sentence.Network_cn: 未消化的肉停留在肠道内腐烂,会导致更多的毒素集结于肠内.

list.abs: Iceland is a country where raw puffin hearts , pickled rams' testicles and putrefying shark flesh are all regularly eaten .在冰岛，人们经常食用生的海雀心脏盐渍羔羊睾丸和腐烂的鲨鱼肉。
农业词汇英语翻译(O-T) ... putrefactive phenomenon 腐烂现象 putrefying bacteria 腐败菌 pycnidium 分生孢子器.
putrefaction 腐败作用putrefying bacteria 腐败细菌pygidium 尾节

a colorless crystalline amine , C8H11NO , found in mistletoe , putrefied animal tissue , certain cheeses , and ergot and also produced synthetically , used in medicine as a sympathomimetic agent .酪胺一种无色晶体氨，C8H11NO，见于槲寄生、腐烂的动物组织、某些奶酪及麦角菌，也可以人工合成，在医学上用作类交感神
牙龈肿痛 painful swollen gums牙龈腐烂 putrefying gums牙龈溃烂 ulcerated gums

entry.def: When something putrefies, it decays and produces a very unpleasant smell.

example.ex: The meat in all of the open flasks putrefied.
example.tran: 所有开口瓶中的肉都腐烂了。

means.word_mean: 1. in an advanced state of decomposition and having a foul odor;

sentences.sentence: "horrible like raw and putrid flesh"- Somerset Maugham

auth_sentence.content: All the hams...sent to Moscow arrived in a putrefied state.
auth_sentence.res_content: All the hams...sent to Moscow arrived in a putrefied state.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: All the hams...sent to Moscow arrived in a putrefied state.
